frameDefinitions: An Agent changes a Part of a complex entity with regard to some Feature in order to achieve some Imposed_purpose affected by the Feature.
An Agent adjusts an Instrument to enable it to interact directly with a difficult-to-access Target_location.

An Agent is involved in an activity whose degree of success is dependent on a parameter of the action matching a particular set of values of a continuous variable or variables (e.g. quantity, location, time).
An Agent who is engaged in an Undertaking accords a Degree of importance to a Consideration that influences the success of an Undertaking.
A Destroyer (a conscious entity) or Cause (an event, or an entity involved in such an event) affects the Patient negatively so that the Patient no longer exists.
An Assailant physically attacks a Victim (which is usually but not always sentient), causing or intending to cause the Victim physical damage.
frameExamples: I need to <t>adjust</t> the thermostat to around 80 degrees when she visits.
If you <t>aim</t> your weapons somewhere else , I 'll be more likely to talk .
The Longview Rangefinder is <t>accurate</t> to within one foot per hundred yards .
Our company <t>emphasizes</t> marketing tried and true products and services.INI
As soon as he stepped out of the bar he was <t>set</t> upon by four men in ski-masks.
listRoleDefinitions: The individual that controls the value of a <fen>Feature</fen>.
The part of the complex entity which is changed in the process of adjusting.
The <fen>Feature</fen> with respect to which the <fen>Part</fen> is adjusted.
The time at which the adjusting occurs.
The location where the adjusting takes place.
The individual that manipulates the <fen>Instrument</fen> to enable interaction with the <fen>Targeted</fen>.
The <fen>Targeted</fen> is the entity located in an indirectly accessible location relative to the <fen>Agent</fen>.
The object manipulated by the <fen>Agent</fen> in order to interact with the <fen>Targeted</fen>.
The location that the <fen>Agent</fen> wishes to ready the <fen>Instrument</fen> to access.
The <fen>Activity</fen> is undertaken by the <fen>Agent</fen> and is directed towards the <fen>Targeted</fen> or <fen>Target_location</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Agent</fen> takes aim.
The place where the <fen>Agent</fen> aims at the <fen>Targeted</fen>.
The individual who tries to interact with the <fen>Target</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Means</fen> by which the <fen>Agent</fen> attempts to hit a <fen>Target_value</fen>.
How closely the expected or actual location that the <fen>Instrument</fen> interacts with corresponds to the <fen>Target_value</fen>.
The object manipulated by the <fen>Agent</fen> in order to interact with the <fen>Target</fen>.
Expected or actual deviation from the <fen>Target_value</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when something hits or misses.
The place where the <fen>Agent</fen> manages or fails to interact with the <fen>Target</fen>.
An event or state of affairs, an attribute, or an entity whose properties have the potential to influence the success of the <fen>Agent</fen>'s <fen>Undertaking</fen>.
The <fen>Agent</fen> is the individual who devotes time, concentration, or other resources to a <fen>Consideration</fen> that is important for the success of a larger <fen>Undertaking</fen>.
The <fen>Competing_consideration</fen> is another factor that is relevant to the <fen>Undertaking</fen> to which the <fen>Agent</fen> devotes less attention or effort.
The <fen>Artifact</fen> is a physical object designed with some <fen>Consideration</fen> in mind, such that it functions to facilitate the <fen>Undertaking</fen>.
The <fen>Action</fen> is performed with importance placed on the <fen>Consideration</fen>.
The time period during which the <fen>Agent</fen> attaches a specified degree of importance to the <fen>Consideration</fen> to further the success of the <fen>Undertaking</fen>.
The location in which the <fen>Agent</fen> attaches the specified level of importance  to the <fen>Consideration</fen>.
The conscious entity, generally a person, that performs the intentional action that results in the <fen>Patient</fen>'s destruction.
The entity which is destroyed by the <fen>Destroyer</fen>.
The event or entity which is responsible for the destruction of the <fen>Patient</fen>.
This role identifies the time when the <fen>Destroyer</fen> destroys the <fen>Patient</fen>.
This role identifies the place where the <fen>Destroyer</fen> destroys the <fen>Patient</fen>.
This role is the being or entity that is injured by the <fen>Assailant</fen>'s attack.
The person (or other self-directed entity) that is attempting physical harm to the <fen>Victim</fen>.
This role identifies the time when the <fen>Assailant</fen> attacks the <fen>Victim</fen>.
This role identifies the place where the <fen>Assailant</fen> makes an assault on the <fen>Victim</fen>.
listRoleExamples: She adjusted <fex>the injectors</fex> to make the mixture leaner.
She adjusted <fex>the temperature of the oven</fex> so that the pie crust would brown a little.
I tried to target <fex>his left thigh</fex> .
If you target <fex>towards the bridge</fex> , make sure to avoid the church .
<fex>The attack</fex> targeted a village south of here.
<fex>The mailman</fex> is very exact about addresses -- he has to be .
For this they would need a thermometer accurate <fex>to within a microkelvin</fex>.
The ICBL has prioritised <fex>working to achieve universalisation of the Mine Ban Treaty in South Asia by 2004</fex>.
Dell said Friday <fex>the company</fex> will put more emphasis on selling software
Monophysite Christians  emphasized Christ's divinity <fex>over his humanity</fex>.
Water is a scarce commodity on French Island so <fex>the guest house</fex> places strong emphasis on water conservation.
Result Oriented <fex>Management</fex>
<fex>In the 1960s</fex> Foucault placed great weight on the notion of archeology.
<fex>In Arizona</fex> we emphasize western bats with a special focus on species identification.
<fex>Who</fex> can unmake the ring?
Who can unmake <fex>the ring</fex>?
<fex>The subsequent explosions</fex> leveled most downtown office buildings.
The mysterious fighter attacked <fex>the guardsmen</fex> with a sabre.
<fex>The mysterious fighter</fex> attacked the guardsmen with a sabre.
<fex>As soon as he stepped out of the bar</fex> he was set upon by four men in ski-masks.
Then Jon-O's forces ambushed them <fex>on the left flank</fex> from a line of low hills.
